title: Is the stock market open today for Presidents' Day?
description: Is the Dow open on Presidents' Day? The stock market and bond market will be closed on Monday. But markets reopen at their usual times on Tuesday.

title: Nine children, ages 5 to 17, shot at Georgia gas station; police investigating
description: The victims ranged in age from 5 to 17. Seven males and two females were hurt after gunfire broke out at the Columbus, Georgia, gas station.
content:
Police were investigating a shooting that left nine children shot at a Georgia gas station on Friday.

title: Is any amount of alcohol safe? It depends on your taste for risk.
description: Amid conflicting studies on the safety and healthiness of alcohol, experts say it really may depend on your genetics and overall health.
content:
In recent years scientists have debated how much alcohol is safe for the average person to drink. There's no question that too much is unhealthy, but what counts as too much is still being debated.
